thread.title: Still time to see ‘Amélie’ before she gets away
thread.title_full: Still time to see ‘Amélie’ before she gets away - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Robert Hurwitt
title: Still time to see ‘Amélie’ before she gets away
text:
Photo: Kevinberne.com Samantha Barks sparkles in the world premiere of “Amélie.” Samantha Barks sparkles in the world premiere of “Amélie.”
A dreamy movie becomes a dream of a stage musical in “Amélie,” the blithe experiment in theatrical magic enjoying a twice-extended run at Berkeley Repertory Theatre. Whether or not it heads to Broadway, it’s worth seeing at Berkeley prices while you can. Samantha Barks sparkles in the world premiere of “Amélie.” Samantha Barks sparkles in the world premiere of “Amélie.”
